6928 Innkeeper Grosk  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Involved in Quests:A Peon's Burden
Known Drops:
Cured Ham Steak
Haunch of Meat
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mutton Chop
Refreshing Spring Water
Roasted Quail
Sweet Nectar
Tough Jerky
Wild Hog Shank

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Durotar

7737 Innkeeper Greul  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Feralas

6738 Innkeeper Kimlya  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Ashenvale

Level 61  (Elite) Humanoid Map
Brogun StoneshieldBrogun SteinschildBrogun PetrescudoBrogun Targe-pierre브로군 스톤쉴드布洛冈·石盾布洛岡·石盾Notes:Per Patch 1.6: There is a new way to enter the battleground queues. Battlemasters! Located in each of the cities, right-clicking on a battlemaster will allow your character to enter a battleground queue just like you normally would if you touched that battleground's entrance portal. The functionality is exactly the same, so when it's your character's time to enter the chosen battleground, you will be teleported directly in. Local guards can give you directions on how to find the battlemaster that you're looking for.

2352 Innkeeper Anderson  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Alterac Swiss
Dalaran Sharp
Darnassian Bleu
Dwarven Mild
Fine Aged Cheddar
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Soft Banana Bread
Stormwind Brie
Sweet Nectar
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Hillsbrad Foothills

6747 Innkeeper Kauth  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Involved in Quests:A Task Unfinished
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Mulgore

6737 Innkeeper Shaussiy  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Darkshore

6807 Innkeeper Skindle  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:46
Known Drops:
Bristle Whisker Catfish
Ice Cold Milk
Longjaw Mud Snapper
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Rockscale Cod
Slitherskin Mackerel
Spinefin Halibut
Spotted Yellowtail
Sweet Nectar

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Stranglethorn Vale

6749 Erma  <Stable Master>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Found in Zones:Elwynn Forest
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Elwynn Forest

1464 Innkeeper Helbrek  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:25 - 30
Found in Zones:Wetlands
Found in Areas:Menethil Harbor
Found in Dungeon:Blackfathom Deeps
Sells:
Cured Ham Steak - 20 
Flagon of Mead - 15 
Haunch of Meat - 1 25

Melon Juice - 5 
Moonberry Juice - 20 
Morning Glory Dew - 40 
Mutton Chop - 5 
Refreshing Spring Water - 25 
Roasted Quail - 40 
Sweet Nectar - 10 
Tough Jerky - 25 
Wild Hog Shank - 10 

Notes:Fill yer tankard and pull up a chair. We've stories to tell and kegs to empty.

What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Wetlands

7736 Innkeeper Shyria  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Feralas

6272 Innkeeper Janene  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Dustwallow Marsh

6790 Innkeeper Trelayne  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Alterac Swiss
Dalaran Sharp
Darnassian Bleu
Dwarven Mild
Fine Aged Cheddar
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Stormwind Brie
Sweet Nectar

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Duskwood

Wild Hog Shank - 10 

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Located northwest of the entrance in The Stonefire Tavern downstairs, second building on your left.Locations in City of Ironforge

1247 Innkeeper Belm  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Rhapsody Malt
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Thunder Ale
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Dun Morogh

6740 Innkeeper Allison  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Found in Zones:Stormwind City at location 4
Found in Areas:Trade District
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Located in the Gilded Rose Inn.

6727 Innkeeper Brianna  <Innkeeper>


Level 20 to 30  Humanoid 
Found in Zones:
Redridge Mountains
Found in Dungeon:
Lakeshire Inn
Scarlet Raven Tavern
Stranglethorn Vale
Sells:
Bristle Whisker Catfish -  5 
Ice Cold Milk -  1 25
Longjaw Mud Snapper -   20
Melon Juice -  5 
Moonberry Juice -  20 
Morning Glory Dew -  40 
Refreshing Spring Water -   25
Rockscale Cod -  10 
Slitherskin Mackerel -   25
Spinefin Halibut -  40 
Spotted Yellowtail -  20 
Sweet Nectar -  10 
Notes:Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?

What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Blasted Lands
 Locations in Redridge Mountains

Locations in Darkshore














6740 Innkeeper Allison  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Found in Zones:Stormwind City at location 4
Found in Areas:Trade District
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Located in the Gilded Rose Inn.

7714 Innkeeper Byula  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Deep Fried Plantains
Goldenbark Apple
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moon Harvest Pumpkin
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Shiny Red Apple
Snapvine Watermelon
Sweet Nectar
Tel'Abim Banana

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in The Barrens

6741 Innkeeper Norman  <Innkeeper>
Type:Undead
Level:30
Found in Zones:The Undercity at location 54
Found in Areas:Trade Quarter
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Unknown: '2022'

6746 Innkeeper Pala  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Alterac Swiss
Dalaran Sharp
Darnassian Bleu
Dwarven Mild
Fine Aged Cheddar
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Stormwind Brie
Sweet Nectar

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Thunder Bluff
Locations in Un'Goro Crater

3934 Innkeeper Boorand Plainswind  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Found in Dungeon:The Wailing Caverns
Known Drops:
Deep Fried Plantains
Goldenbark Apple
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moon Harvest Pumpkin
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Shiny Red Apple
Snapvine Watermelon
Sweet Nectar
Tel'Abim Banana

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in The Barrens

6791 Innkeeper Wiley  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:35
Known Drops:
Bristle Whisker Catfish
Ice Cold Milk
Longjaw Mud Snapper
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Rockscale Cod
Slitherskin Mackerel
Spinefin Halibut
Spotted Yellowtail
Sweet Nectar

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in The Barrens

6735 Innkeeper Saelienne  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Deep Fried Plantains
Goldenbark Apple
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moon Harvest Pumpkin
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Shiny Red Apple
Snapvine Watermelon
Sweet Nectar
Tel'Abim Banana

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Darnassus

6734 Innkeeper Hearthstove  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:15 - 30
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Loch Modan

295 Innkeeper Farley  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:15 - 30
Found in Zones:Elwynn Forest
Found in Areas:Goldshire
Found in Dungeon:Stormwind City
Starts Quests:The Legend of Stalvan
Involved in Quests:Rest and Relaxation
Known Drops:
Alterac Swiss
Dalaran Sharp
Darnassian Bleu
Dwarven Mild
Fine Aged Cheddar
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Refreshing Spring Water
Stormwind Brie
Sweet Nectar

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Elwynn Forest

7744 Innkeeper Thulfram  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Known Drops:
Freshly Baked Bread
Homemade Cherry Pie
Ice Cold Milk
Melon Juice
Moist Cornbread
Moonberry Juice
Morning Glory Dew
Mulgore Spice Bread
Refreshing Spring Water
Rhapsody Malt
Soft Banana Bread
Sweet Nectar
Thunder Ale
Tough Hunk of Bread

Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in The Hinterlands

6929 Innkeeper Gryshka  <Innkeeper>
Type:Humanoid
Level:30
Starts Quests:Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
Doras the Wind Rider Master
Involved in Quests:Ride to Orgrimmar
Notes:What can you do at an Inn?

Well when you stay at an inn, you rest very comfortably. Because of this, you will become "well rested" much more quickly than you would in the wilderness. When you are well rested, you learn more from experience.

You may also speak with any Innkeeper to get a hearthstone, and can later use the hearthstone in order to quickly return to that inn.Locations in Orgrimmar
